languages.text: {n}Вы чувствуете, как кровь начинает тревожно стучать в висках, набирая темп, у вас перехватывает дыхание... и вдруг дробь в ушах затихает, а сердце, приготовившееся выпрыгнуть из груди, замедляет бег.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы чувствуете, как кровь начинает тревожно стучать в висках, набирая темп... и вдруг дробь в ушах затихает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы чувствуете, как кровь начинает тревожно стучать в висках, набирая темп, у вас перехватывает дыхание... и вдруг дробь в ушах затихает, а сердце, приготовившееся выпрыгнуть из груди, замедляет бег.{/n}

{n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sientes que la sangre se acelera a un ritmo alarmante en tus sienes y que te falta el aliento... y de pronto el retumbar de tus oídos se detiene y tu corazón, que parecía querer salir de tu pecho, modera su frenético ritmo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes que la sangre se acelera a un ritmo alarmante en tus sienes y que te falta el aliento... y de pronto el retumbar de tus oídos se detiene y tu corazón, que parecía querer salir de tu pecho, modera su frenético ritmo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}風が吹き抜け、血が勢いよくこめかみを流れるのを感じた。しかし耳鳴りは静まり、胸から飛び出るかと思うほど激しく鼓動していた心臓は、ゆっくりと元の速さに戻っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}風が吹き抜け、血が勢いよくこめかみを流れるのを感じた。しかし耳鳴りは静まり、胸から飛び出るかと思うほど激しく鼓動していた心臓は、ゆっくりと元の速さに戻っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感觉血液在太阳穴里疯狂地涌动，越来越快，仿佛有气流要从你体内迸发出来一样……但随后，你耳中的鼓点声安静了下来，那颗仿佛要跳出胸膛的心脏也逐渐放慢了节奏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉血液在太阳穴里疯狂地涌动，越来越快，仿佛有气流要从你体内迸发出来一样……但随后，你耳中的鼓点声安静了下来，那颗仿佛要跳出胸膛的心脏也逐渐放慢了节奏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous sentez votre sang affluer dans vos tempes avec une pression telle que vous en avez le souffle coupé... mais le bourdonnement dans vos oreilles s'estompe de manière impromptue, et votre cœur, qui semblait être sur le point de bondir hors de votre poitrine, se met à ralentir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sentez votre sang affluer dans vos tempes avec une pression telle que vous en avez le souffle coupé... mais le bourdonnement dans vos oreilles s'estompe de manière impromptue, et votre cœur, qui semblait être sur le point de bondir hors de votre poitrine, se met à ralentir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst, wie dein Blut beunruhigend schnell in deine Schläfen gepumpt wird, während dir der Atem wegbleibt ... Doch dann verklingt das Dröhnen in deinen Ohren und dein Herz, das kurz davor stand, aus deiner Brust zu springen, verlangsamt seinen Rhythmus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst, wie dein Blut beunruhigend schnell in deine Schläfen gepumpt wird, während dir der Atem wegbleibt ... Doch dann verklingt das Dröhnen in deinen Ohren und dein Herz, das kurz davor stand, aus deiner Brust zu springen, verlangsamt seinen Rhythmus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nabzının gitgide ve aşırı bir şekilde hızlandığını şakaklarında hissediyor, nefesinin kesildiğini fark ediyorsun... Sonra bir anda kulaklarındaki davul seslerinin durulduğunu ve göğsünden fırlamak üzere olan kalbinin yavaşladığını duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel your blood start pumping alarmingly in your temples at an increasing pace as the wind is knocked out of you... but then the drumming in your ears quiets, and your heart, which was about to leap out of your chest, slows its rhythm.{/n}
